body.p: The following resolutions were adopted this day at a Meeting of the Citizans of Paducha Wharas the Neutrality of Ky was Violated on Yesterday by the invasion of Ballard Co and the Seizure of two Citzans by Federal Troops from Caro & this Morning by one of the Fedreal Gun Boats Coming up the River and Seizing at the Paduch Wharf & Carrying away the Steamer Ferry Therefore. Resolved we do hereby advise the Governor of this State of these Flagrant invasions of the Soil of Ky= and of her Neutrality & that we require of the Authorities of the State protection from high handed Acts of Aggression Soon No doubt to be Extended to the Captain and Extradition of other Citizans & hereby request of the Governor officially to declare the Neutrality of Sovereignty of Kentucky violated & declare also that if Ky cannot or will not protect our property & persons we will Esteem our onley refuge to appeal to Tennessee Troop for that protection which our State May fail to afford that we immediatly Communicate these Resolutions to the Governor and request an immediate answer by Telegraph

Mayor Sawner Genarel Allen Bigger
Fowler Harris Jr. Comm -- "
